output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows an attacker to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens owned by the attacker, due to a lack of overflow checks.
The mintToken function allows the owner to mint tokens at will, devaluing the token and causing financial loss to token holders.
The transferFrom function allows a user to transfer tokens to any address, regardless of the user's balance, due to incorrect logic.
The claimThrone function allows an attacker to overflow the balance, enabling the attacker to take over the contract.
The ToOwner function unintentionally exposes the function as public, allowing any user to claim ownership and funds.
